overview:
Joe Harrell is digital marketing strategist and product manager.

Harrell is currently the Director of Marketing & Product Management at Alliance for the Art, leading NYC ARTS, the leading source of information about New York City nonprofit cultural organizations. Harrell also leads communications and marketing initiatives for the Allianceâ€™s on- and off-line activities. Before joining Alliance for the Arts, he was director of corporate communications at Time Warner, where he managed Time Warner Corporateâ€™s new media communications, including its corporate Web site, TimeWarner.com, and online employee communications. He is an Account Director for the Taproot Foundation and has worked with nonprofits throughout New York City, providing strategic creative services in the form of Web sites, brochures and brand and identity guidelines. He holds a BFA degree from the University of Michigan.

web_presences.title: Five New Yorkers--four of the most interesting people I know--and me
